articles.author: Megan Archer
articles.title: Vandal attacks leaving West Midland Railway carriages out of action - expressandstar.com
articles.description: Vandals have been warned after a spate of graffiti attacks on trains across the West Midlands.
articles.content:
West Midlands Railway has started its increased timetable and is now running longer trains to help enable passengers practice social distancing. 
But following a spate of vandalism incidents, WMR is having to instead divert staff to sort out graffiti removal… [+931 chars]

articles.title: Two new cases of coronavirus confirmed in Moray - Forres Gazette
articles.description: 72 cases of coronavirus have been confirmed in Moray since the outbreak began.
articles.content:
Coronavirus update.
TWO new cases of coronavirus have been confirmed in Moray overnight.
A total of 72 cases of covid-19 have now been confirmed in the area since the outbreak began.
NHS Grampian confirmed six new confirmed cases of the virus overnight. Th… [+2249 chars]
